content: minutes then squeeze it out and lay flat to dry completely when i lay mine out i make sure it is the length and width that i want it to be blocking cleans the cowl you would be surprised at how dirty the yarn can be and really softens it which gives you amazing drape after blocking the cowl is roughly 12 x 35 if you would like a snugger fit you can make it 30-33 long instead by crocheting fewer stitches in each row once it s completely dry it s time to add the buttons the buttons are completely functional they simply fit through the stitches so there is no need to create buttonholes this also allows the cowl to be worn in many different ways i use 38mm coconut shell buttons for these cowls although slightly smaller buttons would work also you don t want them to be too small however because they will come loose from the stitches you also don t want them much larger because then they may not fit through the stitches page 5 add the buttons to one of the long ends i put my buttons on the lower left side of the cowl when it s facing me which would be the same as putting them in the upper ride side this way when i wear it as a triangle i am buttoning it with my right hand i use stitch markers to mark where i want to put the buttons using the following process the first button in the corner goes 1 in from the side and 1 up from the bottom then i try on the cowl as a triangle see cover picture and mark where i want the 3rd or topmost button i like it to be about where my shoulder is this is usually about 10 5 - 11 up from the short end of the scarf it will still be 1 in from the long side lastly i fold the scarf so that the two stitch markers are touching one on top of the other the fold will be halfway in between these two buttons this is where i put the stitch marker for the 2nd or middle button again 1 in from the long edge of the cowl using the same yarn and a tapestry needle sew on the buttons and weave in the yarn ends see picture below for where the buttons should be page 6 different ways to style your three button cowl these are just a few examples of how you can style a 3 button cowl there are many other ways it s fun to play around with it and find a style that suits your mood this video also has some other ideas that may be helpful page 7
